data.title: Thunderbird Entertainment Group Inc. (THBRF) Company Profile & Overview
data.meta_description: Company profile for Thunderbird Entertainment Group Inc. (THBRF) with a description, list of executives, contact details and other key facts.
data.text:
Thunderbird Entertainment Group Inc. develops, produces, and distributes film and television programs in Canada, the United States, Denmark, the Republic of Ireland, France, and internationally.

The companyâs portfolio consists of animated, factual, and scripted projects. Its programs cover various genres with a focus on childrenâs productions, scripted comedy and dramas, and unscripted contents.

The company also acquires, licenses, and merchandises distribution rights. Thunderbird Entertainment Group Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
